tool_description: Analyzes bin utilization patterns, identifies optimization opportunities, and generates recommendations for improved space efficiency and inventory distribution.

analysis_period_days.description: Number of days to analyze for utilization patterns

zone_filter.description: Specific zones to analyze (empty array means all zones)

min_utilization_threshold.description: Minimum utilization percentage to flag as underutilized

max_utilization_threshold.description: Maximum utilization percentage to flag as overutilized

include_movement_frequency.description: Include analysis of item movement frequency in recommendations

error_messages: Invalid analysis_period_days: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 365.
Invalid utilization thresholds: min_utilization_threshold must be less than max_utilization_threshold, both between 0-100.
Invalid zone_filter: One or more specified zones do not exist.
Insufficient data: Not enough historical data available for the specified analysis period.
usage: Optionally specify analysis_period_days, zone_filter, utilization thresholds, and include_movement_frequency to customize the analysis. Returns utilization metrics and optimization recommendations.

average_utilization_percent.description: Overall average bin utilization across analyzed zones

underutilized_bins.description: List of bin IDs with utilization below threshold

overutilized_bins.description: List of bin IDs with utilization above threshold

optimization_recommendations.description: Actionable recommendations for improving space utilization

potential_space_savings_percent.description: Estimated space savings from implementing recommendations
